{{cpp/utility/functional/function_ref/title|operator()}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/function_ref/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++26|
R operator()( Args... args ) const noexcept(/*noex*/);
}}

Invokes the stored {{rlpsi|/#thunk-ptr}} with {{rlpsi|/#bound-entity}} as its first parameter and the rest of the parameters {{tt|args}}. The {{c|/*noex*/}} part of {{c|operator()}} is identical to those of the template parameter of {{tt|std::function_ref}}.

Equivalent to {{box|{{c/core|return}} {{rlpsi|/#thunk-ptr}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpsi|/#bound-entity}}{{c/core|, std::forward&lt;Args&gt;(args)...);}}}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|args|rest parameters to pass to the stored {{rlpsi|/#thunk-ptr}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{box|{{rlpsi|/#thunk-ptr}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpsi|/#bound-entity}}{{c/core|, std::forward&lt;Args&gt;(args)...)}}}}.

===Exceptions===
Propagates the exception thrown by the underlying function call.
